How do I make a custom theme?

    

        Glad ya' asked! 

        Here's the JSON file code.
    


    
 
 
{
    "accentColor": "#008BFF",
    "secondaryColor": "#007BE0",
    "hoverColor": "#006EC9",
    "backgroundColor": "#242424",

    "frameColor": "#1E1E1E",
    "textBoxColor": "#343638",
    "selectedColor": "#2b2b2b",
    "frameHoverColor": "#555555",
    "rightClickMenuColor": "#222222",

    "frameTextColor": "#FFFFFF",
    "textColor": "#FFFFFF",
    "buttonColor": "#FFFFFF",

    "ctkWindowAppearanceMode": "dark",
    "ctkDefaultColorTheme": "dark-blue"
}
     
 


    

        
    
            
  • Copy that code
    • 
            
  • Depending on your operating system, your custom theme folder is at
    • 
            
      
                
    • Windows: ~/Appdata/Roaming/Noteted/themes
      • 
                
    • Linux: ~/.config/Noteted/themes
      • 
                
    • MacOS: ~/Library/Application Support/Noteted/themes
      • 
            
    
            
  • Make a new json file with whatever name you want
    • 
            
  • Paste the code in the json file
    • 
            
  • Edit it a little bit and then you're done
    •
